title: Dynamic text content type has no effect
description: The bug report is missing the description. Additional details about the issue would be helpful in understanding and addressing the problem.
OB: When using the dynamic text content type, it does not have any effect. The text does not change dynamically as expected. The content remains static.
EB: When using the dynamic text content type, the text should change dynamically based on certain conditions or user input. The content should be updated in real-time without requiring manual refresh or reload.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the application or website.
2. Navigate to the section where dynamic text content is used.
3. Verify that the text content is not changing automatically or updating based on the expected conditions or user input.
